response.original_title: Kraken Help Center (List - Kraken Support Assistance)
response.overview: For less urgent issues ☎️1-[864].336.8850, emailing Kraken is another option. While response times may vary, this method ensures you have written documentation of your issue ☎️1-[864].336.8850 and its resolution. Step-by-Step Guide: Talking to a Live Person via Phone ☎️1-[864].336.8850 1.	Dial the Kraken Toll-Free Number: ☎️1-[864].336.8850. 2.	☎️1-[864].336.8850 Listen to the automated prompts and select the option that best matches your issue (e.g., “account support” or “technical assistance”). 3.	If prompted to enter your account details but you don’t have them, press “0” to bypass this step ☎️1-[864].336.8850. 4.	Repeat “agent” or “representative” when asked what you need. This often speeds up the process of connecting to a live person ☎️1-[864].336.8850.
